did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University
did.unittitle: Curricula Materials- Extension Division Correspondence Study Department, 1935-1949
did.physloc: Located in locked compact shelving, level 1.
did.abstract: Curricula Materials- Extension Division Correspondence Study Department Collection includes course work and administrative materials which describe the curriculum. Exams, daily homework, syllabi, and administrative papers. The full finding aid can be found here.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment for research is required. The collection is open for research. No interlibrary loan.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

Curricula Materials- Extension Division Correspondence Study Department, Accession # RU 3.1.2, University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed and finding aid by Caitlin Johns, October 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Curricula Materials- Extension Division Correspondence Study Department Collection contains correspondence work from the English and Geography classes as well as supplemental materials for an enriched curriculum and a selected list of books. Also present are correspondence work for the Science, Biology and Sociology departments.

blockquote.p: Box 1: Correspondence Work: English and Geography
Box 2: Correspondence Work: Science, Biology, Sociology
